posts.title: LearnPress Payment Settings: The All-in-one tutorial
posts.excerpt: In this article, we will explore all the payment options of Eduma. How to setup course payment using Eduma theme. You will learn how to start with the built-in Paypal payment, and then we will move to installing WooCommerce payment gateway to implement more payment gateways for your website. Besides WooCommerce, we also developed some payment gateway plugins so if you don’t want to use WooCommerce for your website for some reasons, you can skip the part 3 and read the part 4 of this tutorial. Finally, we will also take a look on the ability to create course membership of the theme using LearnPress Paid Membership Pro integration add-on.
